DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this project is to investigate the age-related differences in force-velocity muscle characteristics during isolated knee extensions variable in speed and load, during cyclic movements on a usual and recumbent bike variable in speed and velocity development and a functional test battery with healthy participants aged between 20-80 years.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Power-velocity Muscle Characteristics During Ageing
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers age 20 to 80 years Knee or hip prothesis Systematic training Cardiovascular disease Acute lower back pain Acute knee pain Dementia
